name: Reference - CAR-2021-05-002: Batch File Write to System32 - MITRE
x_kb_abstract: While batch files are not inherently malicious, it is uncommon to see them created after OS installation, especially in the Windows directory. This analytic looks for the suspicious activity of a batch file being created within the C:\Windows\System32 directory tree. There will be only occasional false positives due to administrator actions.
x_kb_reference_title: CAR-2021-05-002: Batch File Write to System32
